title: Unakkena Naan Song Lyrics Kadhalil Vizhunthen
stanzas:
unadhuyiraai enadhuyirum
ulavida thudikkudhe
thani oru naan
thani oru nee
ninaikavum valikkudhe

idhayathai edharkkaga
edharkaga idam maatrinaai
inikkum oru thunbathai
kudi yaetrinaai.

pudhumaigal thandhu
magizhichiyil ennai aaltha
parisugal thaedi pidippaai

kasandhidum seidhi vandhal
pagirndhida pakkam iruppaai
noiyena konjam paduthaal
thaaiyena maari anaippaai

aruginil vaa aruginil vaa
idaiveli valikkudhe
unadhuyiril enadhhuyirai
ootri thudikkudhe

naan enil nee
nee enil naan
ninaidhida pidikkudhe

mazhai veyil kaatrodu
boogambam vandhaalume
unadhu madhi naan
thoongum veedaagume

enakena edhuvum seithaai
unakenna enna naan seiven
pongidum nenjin unarvai
sollavum vaarthai podhaathe
vizhigalin oram thulirkum
oru thuli neerey sollatum

seo.title: Unakkena Naan Song Lyrics Kadhalil Vizhunthen
seo.description: Get the complete Unakkena Naan Song Lyrics Kadhalil Vizhunthen from Kadhalil Vizhunthen. composed by Vijay Antony and sung by Ramya NSK. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
